bug.short_desc: Demo app for Github / OAuth is missing

long_desc.thetext:
The demo app is referenced in a few prominent places, e.g. from http://news.qooxdoo.org/qooxdoo-1-6-released http://demo.qooxdoo.org/devel/demobrowser/#data~Github.html to point to http://demo.qooxdoo.org/1.6/github/
Unfortunately, at this location the demo no longer exists. As it is an important showcase for OAuth-based authorization it should be recreated for the initial release 1.6 as mentioned above, and also made available for the current and upcoming qooxdoo releases.

The demo is still working, however it uses JS that is webkit-only ("window.location.origin").
What I've done:
- adapted the demo in order to work in all browsers - enhanced the description/documentation for the demo to explain better what this demo is about (qooxdoo REST wrapper) and which APIs it uses (GitHub OAuth and Gists API) and how someone (qx core dev / qx user) can run it locally or build on it. - included the demo in the regular demo generation
Due to the nature of the demo (using GitHub OAuth), the demo expects to be run at http://demo.qooxdoo.org. It won't be runnable at a different location without additional environment adaptation (e.g. WPAD PAC-file XOR Reverse Proxy) - see details within source of "application/github/source/index.php".
